title: Pythonic R
text: PythonicR organization dedicated creating R packages mirror functionality naming conventions Python standard library. aim ease developers’ transition Python R providing familiar functions consistent naming conventions. PythonicR, can enjoy power flexibility R without cognitive load remembering different function names behaviors.

title: Pythonic R
text: developers, often switch programming languages, unique syntax naming conventions. Python’s standard library known simplicity uniformity, making easy remember use. However, R’s powerful diverse set functions can sometimes hurdle accustomed Python. PythonicR aims bridge gap providing R packages emulate Python’s standard library, making easier Python developers use R.

title: Pythonic R
text: pythonicr package purpose, best way get started poking around seeing might useful . pathlib: Python-ish path manipulations re: Python-ish regular expressions sets: Python-ish set operations strs: Python-ish string operations
